msbt.message: Oh, hey! You're , right? I heard someone talking about you.So, you just get here today? Rad! Me too! Wait, wait, wait. Back up. I gotta do a proper intro.Why, hello there. My name is . Welcome to my house. How do you do?Ha That's SO not me. Whatever. When I heard I wasn't the only newcomer, I got psyched.Us newbies're totally gonna ROCK this place, . Just you wait!

We haven't metyou new here? Welcome to ! I'm !Hold up, are you ? I heard about you. Psyched to finally meet you, !Well, if you ever need stuff, or need someone to come rescue a boring party, I'm your gal!

, right? Hey, I got it right! I'm . What's up?You know you're the talk of the island, right? Like, EVERYONE wants to meet the newbie!Well, welcome to the island. Hit me up if you ever need a party partner. Alright, ?
Are you the everyone's talking about?Cool! Sothe intro thing. I'm , . How are you?Don't be a stranger if you ever wanna throw a party or need a buddy to hang out with!

Oh, hey. You're the new neighbor, , right? Cool. I'm .Sorry, you caught me at a bad time. I'm kinda sick, so I'd stay back if I were you, .Well, we should totally hang out when I'm feeling a bit better. Take care!

Oh, hey! You a local? Cool! I'm . I just moved here, uhTODAY!It's nice gettin' some face-to-face time. Y'know, making friends, finding out who's cool.Anyway, I'm bad at this formal stuff. If you wanna hang out, let me know, !

Hey, nice ice-breaking! I like that. I'm . How're you doing, ?This rocks! My first day here and I'm already making buddies! And folks here are so chill. I dig it!Anyway, I'm still figuring out what's what, so I'm gonna get back to that. Don't be a stranger, alright?
Hey, I'm ! How you doing?Uhwe HAVEN'T met, right? Sorry, I just moved here a few days ago. SOOOO many new faces!Well, in case I didn't tell you, if you ever wanna hang out, let me know, !
Oh! I haven't met you yet. Name's ! How're you doing?I just got here a few days ago, so I'm still feeling the place out.Come find me if you wanna chill, alright, ?

We haven't met yet, right? Sorry, been kinda slow on the intros. I'm .Normally I'm on top of this sort of thing, but I've been super busy lately. Sogood initiative!Let me know if you wanna hang out sometime, alright, ?
Oh, you're, right? I heard about you. Cool to finally meeAAAACHOO! Ugh. Sorry, I'm kinda under the weather. Come by when I'm feeling better, we'll get to know each other.

You from here? I don't think we've met. I'm .I was living on , but I got some cool advice from and moved here.I only got here today, but I gotta say, it's pretty sweet! Swing by if you ever wanna chill, .
Hey there, stranger! My name's , just in from .Wow, was right! This island's awesome! I'm totally digging the vibe here, .Anyway! Cool to meet you. I hope I see you around!
Howdy there, new neighbor! I'm . Just moved in from .I guess 's known about this place for a while. I'm stoked to be clued in!Well, if you ever wanna do neighborly stuff, let me know, !

Oh, hey! I haven't introduced myself yet. My name's . I'm from .Do you know ? We were chattin' a bunch and wow, did ever get hyped! So I moved here and yep, it's totally as cool as advertised. Anyway, I've got parties to plan. See you around!

Hey, how are you? I'm .I just got in from , but I guess I caught something on the trip over.I haven't even been able to thank for inviting me to live h— AAAACHOO!Ugh. I really hope this clears up quick, . I'm kinda miserable

Wow! First day and I already got visitors. I'm , fresh from !Someone from here was REALLY talking the place up, but I guess they're not around anymore.Oh well! You seem cool, so let me know if you ever wanna get up to some mischief, !

Oh, hey! I don't know you. I'm .I used to live on . I took a local's advice to move here, but I guess they bolted. Rude.So, now I'm kinda on the hunt for new friends, . Let me know if you ever wanna hang out!

Hmm? You here to see me? Hey, I'm .Sorry if I don't seem super psyched, but I'm kinda sick with something right now, .But yeah, I came here from on someone's invite. They left though.Anyway, thanks for coming by. Let's hang out when I'm feeling better.

Hey! A stranger! OrI guess I'm the stranger here nowAnyway, I'm !I actually used to live here a while back, but I don't think you were around then, .Whatever! I'm looking forward to getting to know you. See you around, alright?

Oh, hey! I've seen you around. Been meaning to say hello. Hello! I'm .I actually lived here a long time ago, but I moved away forreasons. But now I'm back, baby!If you were looking for a new best buddy, you just found 'em! I'll see you around, !

Oh, hey! I heard about you. You're the cool one, right? I'm .Oh, don't get too close. I'm kinda sick.I used to live here, but it's been a while. I guess my body's not used to stuff here anymore.Anyway, my head's pounding. Let's chat when I'm feeling better, alright, ?

Hey there! You the welcoming party? Name's , just in from .You're , right? Nice! I think I heard about you. All good stuff, don't worry.Well, I think I'm gonna like it here, ! And I bet we're gonna get along great.

You're , right? I think I heard your name somewhere. Anyway, I'm .I just moved here a few days ago from .I gotta say, it rocks here! It's gonna take a lot for it to outshine my old home, but so far I like its odds.Anyway, don't be a stranger, . See you!

Hey there! I promise I haven't been dodging you. Just always seems like we're going in opposite directions!Anyway, I'm . I moved here a little while ago from . Ever heard of it?Well, I'm glad I met you. I'll see you around. Alright, ?

Hey! I don't think we've met yet. I'm .Probably seems like I've been trying to dodge doing intro stuff, but I promise I'm not, .Anyway, I moved here from . Ever been? It's pretty rad.Meanwhile, this place is awesome. Oh, umawesome is better than rad, by the way.Well, tell me if you're ever headed to . I got lots of recommendations. Till then, see you!

<10_10 />BWAAAACHOOO!<10_9 />Oh, hey. I don't know you yet, do I? I'm . I'd shake hands, butI'm sick, so ew.I came from a while ago, but my body's STILL not used to being here. Ugh.Tell you what, let's save the chat for when I'm well, OK? See you later, .

Yo! You're new here, ain't ya? All good. Let me welcome you to , !My name's . And you're. It's rad to meet you, !I've been around here since, like, the beginning, so if you have questions, I'm kind of a pro.But for now, I'll just let you get back to whatever. See you around!

Oh greatnow I'm seein' faces. Well, a face. And a kinda-friendly lookin' one too. Hang on a secYou're real, aren't you? Sorry, this cold's got my mind goin' loopy. I'm . What's up?Actuallyas awesome as it is to meet someone new, maybe we oughta take a rain check till I'm feelin' better.I don't wanna, like, start telling you I invented the or something,

You from here? I don't think we've met. I'm .So, I was out on a day trip when tipped me off about moving here.I only arrived today, but I gotta say, it's pretty sweet! Swing by if you ever wanna chill, .

Hey there, stranger! My name's , .Wow, was right!I ran into 'em on a day trip and kept hearin' about what a rad place this is. The vibe here's PERFECT.Anyway! Cool to meet you. I hope I see you around!

Howdy there, new neighbor! I'm . Just moved here.I ran into on a trip and kept hearin' how this place was like some best-kept secret.I'm so stoked to be clued in! Well, that's my story. Hit me up if you ever wanna do neighborly stuff!

Oh, hey! I haven't introduced myself yet. My name's .Do you know ? I ran into 'em on a day trip. That'skinda why I'm here.I kept hearin' how much love there is for this place. And now that I'm here, I totally see why! This place rocks!

Hey, how are you? I'm .You might wanna stay back. I'm kinda sick. Guess I caught something on that little day tripOh well. That trip's where I heard about , so it's not all bad news, .Speaking of, I haven't been able to thank for inviting me to live h— AAAACHOO!Ugh. I really hope this clears up quick. I'm kinda miserable

Wow! First day and I already got visitors, .I'm . I heard about this place while I was on a little voyage while back.Someone from here was REALLY talking the place up, but I guess they're not around anymore.Oh well! You seem cool, so let me know if you ever wanna get up to some mischief!

Oh, hey! I don't know you. I'm .So get this—I was on a little day trip, just chillin' out, when someone from here started sayin' I should join 'em.Now, here I ambut it looks like they bolted. Rude!Anyway, I'm kinda on the hunt for new friends. Let me know if you wanna hang out, !

Hey, how are you? I'm .You might wanna stay back. I'm kinda sick. Guess I caught something on that last tour I tookOh well. That tour's where I heard about , so it's not all bad news, .Speaking of, I haven't seen the rock star that invited me here. Guess they moved on— AAAACHOO!Ugh. I really hope this clears up quick. I'm kinda miserable

You from here? I don't think we've met. I'm .I was hanging out at the campsite when swung by sayin' I'd like it here.It's only day one, but so far it lives up to the hype! I think I'm gonna like it here, .

Hey there, stranger! My name's , .I ran into at the campsite, bragging all about this place. So I kinda impulse-moved.And wow, was THAT the right call! This island's awesome! I'm totally digging the vibe here.Anyway! Real cool to meet you. I hope I see you around!
Howdy there, new neighbor! I'm . Just moved here.I ran into at the campsite, and got sold hard on moving here. I'm super stoked to be clued in! Hit me up if you ever wanna do neighbor-stuff, !

Oh, hey! I haven't introduced myself yet. My name's .Do you know ? I ran into 'em at the campsite. That'skinda why I'm here.This place up got REALLY hyped up. And now that I'm here, I totally see why! This place rocks!

Hey, how are you? I'm .You might wanna stay back. I'm kinda sick. Guess my body still hasn't recovered from moving yet.So, I heard about while at the campsite. It sounded pretty rad, and here I am.Speaking of, I haven't been able to thank for inviting me to live h— AAAACHOO!Ugh. I really hope this clears up quick. I'm kinda miserable

Wow! First day and I already got visitors, .The name's . I ran into one of your neighbors at your campsite a while back.They were REALLY talking the place up, so I movedbut it looks like they jumped ship before I got here. Rude!Anyway, you seem pretty cool, so let me know if you ever wanna get up to some mischief!

Oh, hey! I don't know you. I'm .So get this. I was chilling out at your campsite when one of your neighbors came up and asked me to move here.Well, I movedbut now it looks like they've bolted. Rude!Anyway, I'm kinda on the hunt for new friends. Let me know if you wanna hang out, !

Hey, how are you? I'm .You might wanna stay back. I'm kinda sick. Guess I caught something when I was over at the campsite.Oh well. The campsite's where I got invited to , so it's not all bad news, .Speaking of, I haven't seen the rock star that invited me here. Guess they moved on— BWAAACHOOO!Ugh. I really hope this clears up quick. I'm kinda miserable

Whoa! Day one and the visitors are pouring in. What's up, stranger? My name's .You know , right? I was over at the campsite and we got to talkin'.Well, we hit it off, I got invited to move here, and, umnow I'm fightin' a box-avalanche. YeahWhatever. I'm sure box-free times are ahead. We should hang out when those arrive, !

Hey, what's up? I don't think we've met. I'm .So, you know the campsite, right? I ran into one of your neighbors there. Name of .We talked for a while, and finally I got myself invited to come live here.Total surprise. I mean, I didn't visit expecting to move here, but I kinda figured why not, !Anyway, now that we're neighbors, we gotta party. You tell me the when and the where, and I'm in!

Oh! I've heard about you. You're , right? Hey, I'm , .Yeah, was going on and on about how everyone on rocks.We met out at the campsite, hit it off, and then I got surprise-invited to move out here.Well, since talked you up so much, how about we hang out sometime?

What's up? You from here? I'm . Cool to meet you, .I was out at the campsite when I met and wow! Never made a friend so fast!And then I kept hearin' how cool is And THEN I got invited to move hereWell, I couldn't say no, could I?Gotta say, now that I'm here, I am so glad I moved. This place rocks!Anyway, you didn't come here for my life story. But I do wanna get to know you, so don't be a stranger, alright?

Are you ? Hey there. I've heard about you. My name's— BWAAAACHOO!Let me try that again. My name's . Ugh This cold's driving me bonkers.Like, I was at the campsite, met the awesome , got asked to move here, and nowsick.It's really not fair, but that's life I g— BWAAAACHOOOO!Right How about you swing by later and I'll focus on beating this bug. Sound good, ?

Hey, -er. Or is that -ian? Whatever. Hi, I'm !So here's the deal. I was out at your campsite, I talked to someone, they invited me to move, and here I am!Buteveryone looks confused when I try to describe the person I talked to. They had aface. Um, yeahWell, either I imagined the whole thing, or they were some rad hermit that moved away, .Whichever it is, I'm here now, you're here, and you seem cool. After I'm unpacked, let's hang out. Sound fun?

Hey, you're , right? I'm . Nice to meet you.So, you don't know anyone that hangs out at the campsite randomly inviting folks to move here, do you?Didn't think so. Well, whoever it was that got me here seems to be long gone. I wanted to thank 'em.Their loss! I'll just thank you instead. Thanks! rocks. Let's party some time, !
